sentences.english: Last year, high winds stoked wildfires in Southern California and destroyed thousands of homes.
sentences.chinese: 去年，强烈的风势加剧野火的灾情，摧毁数千户房屋。

sentences.english: Disaster situation, the sea shortly world Street bars unable to operate normally.
sentences.chinese: 受灾情影响，短期内海上世界酒吧街无法正常开业。

sentences.english: There were almost no non-disaster years in late Qing Dynasty of China's social situation .
sentences.chinese: 晚清的中国社会灾情频仍，几乎无年不灾。

sentences.english: President Obama went to see some of the damage in Tuscaloosa on Friday.
sentences.chinese: 周五，奥巴马总统准备前往塔斯卡卢萨市查看灾情。

sentences.english: Towns situated in the hills near Rio de Janeiro were worst hit.
sentences.chinese: 位在里约热内卢市附近的山丘城镇，灾情最为惨重。

sentences.english: The findings shall be reported to the said people's governments without delay.
sentences.chinese: 灾情调查结果，应当及时报告本级人民政府。

sentences.english: There were no immediate reports of damage from those quakes.
sentences.chinese: 目前没有关于两次地震灾情的报导。

sentences.english: Initial reports from the Taiwanese village, Hsiao-lin, were sketchy.
sentences.chinese: 早期报道的台湾农村地区的灾情只是粗略的。

sentences.english: Vu Thi says it is urgent that the emergency response be stepped up.
sentences.chinese: 吴悌说，应该加强紧急灾情反应，这是迫在眉睫的。

sentences.english: Soldiers from the Chengdu Military Command have chosen to walk to the areas with heaviest damage inflicted by the quake last night.
sentences.chinese: 成都军区官兵已于昨晚徒步进入灾情最重的地区。

sentences.english: The Chinese side attaches high attention to the disaster in Morocco.
sentences.chinese: 中方高度关注摩洛哥地震灾情。

sentences.english: Safety of the lives of tens of thousands of people, in fact, the most severe disaster order.
sentences.chinese: 数万人的生命安危，其实就是最严厉的灾情命令。

definition: disaster-stricken/to be hit by a natural calamity
to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
water levels during the flood season
